response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. Considering its intrinsic worth, I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $7,500. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure you have the opportunity to acquire it at a significant discount. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 7500}
